ygData.subject: Selling:SHORT SWORD OF YKESHA
ygData.msgSnippet: I m currently selling a Short Sword of Ykesha on eBay, and I knew that people who want this Incredible sword would want to see it! The sword is available on
ygData.messageBody:
I'm currently selling a Short Sword of Ykesha on eBay, and I knew that people who want this Incredible sword would want to see it! The sword is available on the Prexus server and I'm able to deliver it almost anywhere! The bid ends on the 29th, and here is the address to the bid:

http://cgi.ebay.com/aw-cgi/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=222857797

Please come by and at least take a look if you are on the Prexus server! This sword is usable by Warriors and all races too. The sword does a random 75+ direct damaging spell, is found in the hardest creature in Lower Guk, and is the best 1hs weapon outside the planes. For any questions at all, contact me at:
Sagawa@.... Take a look when you get the chance,

Thanks

(Readies for flames)
